onboarding.text:
Welcome to AI Word Detector!

Getting Started:

1. Click [+] to create a new library
   (e.g., "Finance", "Medical", "CS")

2. Click [Load PDF] to add papers to your library
   Select a folder containing PDF files

3. Paste your text here and click [Analyze]
   Words will be highlighted based on rarity:
   - Green = Common (>50% of papers)
   - Black = Normal (10-50%)
   - Orange = Rare (<10%)
   - Red = Unseen (never appeared)

Tip: Click [â‹®] to rename, view info, or manage libraries!
